site_description: Hi there, I'm an independent Digital Designer & Digital Content Creator, a Web Engineer and Animator for brands that like to have fun.
hero_title: Welcome To Ameerah Muhammad Ashir's Website.
hero_subtitle: Ameerah is a Software Engineer (Full Stack), Digital Content Creator, an Animator, UI/UX Graphics Designer, Graphics designer (motion graphics and logos), Photographer, Cinematographer, an Entrepreneur, Entrepreneurship Leadership, Digital Marketer, Activist, Community Volunteer, and a Columnist at Wikipedia also a Podcaster and ICT Innovator.
